column2: "Na okodur Derbe nye Listra so: na hwɛ
column3: Osuanyi bi wɔ hɔ a ne dzin dze Timoti a ɔyɛ Jewnyi ɔbaa bi a ɔbɛyɛɛ gyedzinyi no ne ba
column4: na n’egya dze

column2: "Oyi na enuanom a wɔwɔ Listra nye Ikonium no bɔɔ no dzin pa."
"Na Paul pɛɛ dɛ ɔnye no kɔ
column3: na ɔfaa no twaa no twatsia osian Jewfo a wɔwɔ apaa mu hɔ no ntsi
column4: osiandɛ hɔn nyina nyim dɛ n’egya yɛ Griiknyi."

column2: "Na worutwa mu wɔ nkurow no mu no
column3: wɔdze mbra a asomafo nye mpanyimfo a wɔwɔ Jerusalɛm hyɛe no maa hɔn dɛ wondzi do."

column2: "Na asɔr horow no yɛɛ ndam wɔ gyedzi no mu
column3: na hɔn dodow kɔr sor daa."

column2: "Na wokotwaa mu wɔ Frigyia nye Galatia asaase do
column3: na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no braa hɔn dɛ mma wɔnnka asɛm no wɔ Asia;"

column2: "na wɔbaa Misia tsentsendo no
column3: wɔpɛɛ dɛ nkyɛ wɔbɔkɔ Bitinia; na Jesus no Sunsum amma hɔn kwan;"

column2: "na wɔpaa Misia ho baa Troas."
"Na anadwe no
column3: Paul nyaa enyido adzehu dɛ Masidonia ɔbarimba bi gyina hɔ reserɛ no dɛ
column4: Twa bra Masidonia bɔboa hɛn."

column2: "Na ohun enyido adze no
column3: ntsɛmara na yɛhyehyɛɛ dɛ yerisi mu akɔ Masidonia
column4: osiandɛ yehun no ampa dɛ Ewuradze afrɛ hɛn dɛ yɛnkɛka asɛmpa no nkyerɛ hɔn."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi yetui fii Troas tseen hɛnho baa Samotreesi
column3: na adze kyee no yɛbaa Neapolis;"

column2: "na yefii hɔ baa Filipi a ɔyɛ kuropɔn wɔ Masidonia a ɔyɛ mansin no mu; na yedzii kurow yi mu nda kakra."
"Na ahomgyeda no yefii kuropɔn no mu kɔr esutsen ho wɔ beebi a yɛdween dɛ asɔryɛbea bi wɔ
column3: na yɛtsenaa ase na yɛkasaa kyerɛɛ mbaa a woebehyia hɔ no."

column2: "Na ɔbaa bi a ne dzin dze Lidia a ɔtɔn tam memen
column3: nyamesuronyi a ofi Tiatira kurow mu no tsee: ɔno na Ewuradze buee n’akoma dɛ ontsie dza Paul kae no."

column2: "Na wonumaa ɔno nye ne fiemba no
column3: ɔserɛɛ dɛ
column4: Sɛ hom ebu me dɛ megye Ewuradze dzi ara ampa a
column5: hom mbra me fie mbɛtsena hɔ. Na ɔserɛɛ hɛn araa ma yɛnye no kɔree."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ yɛrokɔ asɔryɛbea no
column3: abaawa bi a ɔwɔ akɔm sunsum behyiaa hɛn
column4: ɔno na ɔdze akɔm ama no wuranom enya hɔnho twom."

column2: "Odzii Paul nye hɛn ekyir
column3: na ɔtseaa mu dɛ
column4: Nyimpa yi yɛ Ɔsorsor Nyankopɔn nkowaa a wɔkyerɛ hom nkwagye kwan."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ iyi nda pii. Na ɔyɛɛ Paul ahomtsew na ɔdaan noho see sunsum no dɛ
column3: Mehyɛ wo wɔ Jesus Kraest dzin mu dɛ fi no mu fi. Na ofiir edzi dɔn no ara mu."

column2: "Na no wuranom hun dɛ hɔn adzenya enyidado asa no wosusuoo Paul nye Silas mu twee hɔn kɔr gua do etsitsir no enyim
column4: "na wɔdze hɔn kɛmaa asɛndzifo no dɛ
column5: Nyimpa yi a wɔyɛ Jewfo yi
column8: "na wɔrekyerɛkyerɛ amambra a yennyi ho kwan dɛ yɛgye anaadɛ yɛyɛ

column2: "Na nyimpadodow no soɛree tsiaa hɔn; na asɛndzifo no tsetseew hɔn ntar mu fii hɔnho
column3: na wɔhyɛɛ dɛ wɔmbɔ hɔn mbaa."

column2: "Na wɔbɔɔ hɔn mbaa pii no
column3: wɔdze hɔn koguu efiadze
column4: na wɔhyɛɛ efiadzehwɛnyi no dɛ ɔmfa hɔn nsie yie;"

column2: "na ɔnodze
column3: ɔgyee dɛm ahyɛdze yi no
column4: ɔdze hɔn koguu efiadze a ɔwɔ ekyir no mu
column5: na ɔbɔɔ hɔn anan dua mu."

column2: "Na esuom no
column3: Paul nye Silas bɔɔ mpaa na wɔtoow ndwom maa Nyankopɔn
column4: na adaduafo no tsiee hɔn."

column2: "Na awerɛfir mu ara asaasewosow kɛse bae ma efiadze no fapem hihimii
column3: na amonmu hɔ ara mbobow no nyina buebuei
column4: na hɔn nyina hɔn nkyehoma sansanee."

column2: "Na efiadzehwɛnyi no nyanee fii nda mu
column3: na ohun dɛ efiadze mbobow no ebuebue no
column4: ɔtwee n’afona dɛ oribedzi noho ewu osiandɛ ɔdween dɛ adaduafo no eguanguan."

column2: "Na Paul dze ndze kɛse tseaa mu dɛ
column3: Mma nnyɛ woho bɔn bi
column4: na hɛn nyina wɔ ha."

column2: "Na obisaa kandzea dze ntsɛmpɛ kɔr mu
column3: na ɔdze ahopopo kɔhwee Paul nye Silas enyim
column8: ebɛnadze na menyɛ ma wɔngye me nkwa?"

column2: "Na wɔsee no dɛ
column3: Gye Ewuradze Jesus dzi
column4: na wɔbɛgye ɔwo nye wo fifo nkwa."

column2: "Na wɔkaa Ewuradze n’asɛm no kyerɛɛ ɔno nye hɔn a wɔwɔ ne fie nyina."
"Na ɔfaa hɔn anadwe dɔn no ara mu hohoor hɔn mbaa no ano
column3: na ɔmaa wonumaa ɔno nye hɔn a wɔyɛ nedze nyina amonmu hɔ ara."

column2: "Na ɔdze hɔn baa ne fie
column3: na ɔtoo hɔn pon
column4: na no ho sɛpɛɛw no

column2: "Na adze kyee no
column3: asɛndzifo no somaa nsordaafo baa dɛ
column4: Gyaa nyimpa no ma wɔnkɔ."

column2: "Na efiadzehwɛnyi no kaa asɛm no kyerɛɛ Paul dɛ
column3: Asɛndzifo no asoma dɛ wongyaa hom ma hom nkɔ: dɛm ntsi afei hom mpue nkɔ dwudwoodwo."

column2: "Na Paul see hɔn dɛ
column3: Woemmbu hɛn atsɛn
column4: na wɔahwe hɛn a yɛyɛ Romefo wɔ gua do
column6: na afei worigyaa hɛn wɔ nsumaa mu anaa? Dabida! Na ma hɔnara mbra mbeyi hɛn."

column2: "Na nsordaafo no kɛkaa asɛm no kyerɛɛ asɛndzifo no
column3: na wɔtsee dɛ wɔyɛ Romefo no
column4: wosuroi;"

column2: "na wɔbae bɛpaa hɔn kyɛw maa hɔn dzibem
column3: na woyii hɔn na wɔserɛɛ hɔn dɛ womfi kurow no mu nkɔ."

column2: "Na wofii efiadze hɔ kɔr Lidia fie
column3: na wohun enuanom no
column4: wɔhyɛɛ hɔn nkuran
